How Tokenization Works

Tokenization transforms human language into digestible units for AI, allowing machines to process meaning by assigning each part a numerical ID; this process holds the key to how machines understand us

Character-level

tokenizer

Subword-level

tokenizer

Word-level

tokenizer

Those tokens are then mapped to IDs

and each token has a location in 4k+ dimensions

From Conceptual Space to Numbers

Words like "King" and "Queen" exist as points in AI’s mathematical space. By calculating relationships between these vectors, machines reveal how they understand language—and the hidden patterns within

King

Queen

0.8

0.6

0.7

0.8

King: Vector [0.8, 0.6]

Man: Vector [0.9, 0.4]

Woman: Vector [0.7, 0.6]

Queen: Vector [0.7, 0.8]

Man

Woman

0.9

0.4

0.7

0.6

Now you can move across a conceptual spectrum just with math
